Micaela's Musings

Hey there!

Somehow, by some chance you have arrived at my personal website! I have created this to share a variety of information. This is just the beginning of something I plan on investing time in over the next several years. Currently, you can find my very simple blog around the passing of my beautiful little sister, Marisa. Eventually, you will find more information about me, my work experience and career, my incredible little rescue Scotia, my past and future traveling, and anything else I feel like putting up on the internet.

Feel free to take a look around and make yourself at home here. I post something in the â€˜membering Mari tab on the 26th of each month and make irregular monthly updates to the website overall, so come back sometime soon!

I hope you enjoy this as much as I have enjoyed creating it.
